thread.title: LOCAL ROUNDUP: Bishop's Jernigan, Graves nominated for McDonald's All-American Game
thread.title_full: LOCAL ROUNDUP: Bishop's Jernigan, Graves nominated for McDonald's All-American Game

author: ENTERPRISE STAFF
title: LOCAL ROUNDUP: Bishop's Jernigan, Graves nominated for McDonald's All-American Game
text:
KERNERSVILLE – Bishop McGuinness basketball standouts Adelaide Jernigan and Nicholas Graves have been nominated for the McDonald's All-American Game.
Jernigan is a senior guard who has signed with N.C. State's women's basketball team, while Graves is a senior guard who has committed to Kenyon's men's basketball team.
